name: Element Columns
description:
Solo card game about playing cards in ascending order, but how you're allowed to play cards from your hand make it a real puzzle-y experience!

Game Features

  • New game produces a random game to play
  • Daily game produces a new game to play every day -- try to maximize your score!

How to Play

  • Play a card from your hand. Note you can only play a card from the front (left) or back (right) of your hand. Want that card in the middle?  You have to choose how to get to it.
  • Cards must be played in ascending order, but not necessarily sequential.
  • If you play a card that is not in ascending order, then the previous group of cards will be scored. The element column is now reset and any value card can be played there
  • The game ends when all games have been played.
  • Final scoring will be applied to the final stack of unscored cards when the game ends.

Scoring

  • 1 card: 0 points
  • 2 cards: 10 points
  • 3 cards: 30 points
  • 4 cards: 60 points
  • 5 cards: 100 points
  • 6 cards: 150 points
  • 7 cards: 210 points
